readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-carousel: Accessibility label for the overall image browsing widget

Visually-hidden button label for selecting an image with the given description.

Parameters:
* $1: provided alt text from the document or filename
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-detail-c: Label for button to expand the text associates with the displayed image
Label for button to collapse the text associates with the displayed image
Label for button to toggle between the cropped & full image
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-detail-s: Label for button to share the image
Label for button to copy the link to the image page
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-detail-v: Label for button to open the image on Wikimedia Commons
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-detail-d: Label for button to download the image

Label for downloading the image in its original size.

Parameters:
* $1: width of the image in pixels
* $2: height of the image in pixels

Label for downloading the image in small size.

Parameters:
* $1: width of the image in pixels
* $2: height of the image in pixels

Label for downloading the image in medium size.

Parameters:
* $1: width of the image in pixels
* $2: height of the image in pixels

Label for downloading the image in large size.

Parameters:
* $1: width of the image in pixels
* $2: height of the image in pixels

Label for downloading the image in extra large size.

Parameters:
* $1: width of the image in pixels
* $2: height of the image in pixels
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-image-al:
Fallback alternative text for images that are missing an alt text.

Parameters:
* $1: filename (without extension)
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-loading: Accessibility label for the progress indicator when loading an image in detail view
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-overlay-: Label for button found at the bottom of the overlay to return to the article.
Visually-hidden button label for closing the Overlay.
Accessibility label for the overlay that contains the detail view and visual table of contents
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-vtoc-hea: Label for the article image section of the visual table of contents
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-vtoc-oth: Label for media from other projects
Label for progress bar that indicates images from other projects are being loaded
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-vtoc-vie: Button label for images in the visual table of contents to jump to the article at the position of the selected image
readerexperiments-imagebrowsing-vtoc-ext:
Text describing which external Wikipedia an image was found on.

Parameters:
* $1: full hostname of the external Wikipedia (e.g. en.wikipedia.org)

Text describing which external Wikipedias an image was found on.

Parameters:
* $1: full hostname of one of the external Wikipedias (e.g. en.wikipedia.org)
* $2: the amount of other Wikipedias the file is also used on

Text describing which external non-Wikipedia projects an image was found on.

Parameters:
* $1: localized list of project names (e.g. 'Wikidata, Wikivoyage, and Wikiquote')
